name: Let the Gummies Die
description:
If playing the Web Version, use full screen. Press "P" to pause.

Made in 9 days for the LTGD: Let's Talk Game Jam!

The monsters want to eat your precious Gummies! Defend them by hauling and placing defensive weapons along their path... But the only way to obtain such power is to sacrifice the same Gummies you are trying to defend!



Programming, Game Concept:
Jadon
https://jadonthedev.itch.io/

3D Modelling:
Britton W.
https://multullar.itch.io/
https://sketchfab.com/Multullar
https://www.artstation.com/multullar

Music Composer:
Niklas
https://thatsitsiryoureleaving.itch.io/
